entry.title: 🎉 Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ⭐️

entry.title: 甜蛙-约会附近的人，同城陌生人交友陪玩聊天软件
entry.id: 甜蛙-约会附近的人，同城陌生人交友陪玩聊天软件-1745985748755
entry.content:
Discount Information（Price：₺39,99 → ₺19,99 (₺19,99 ~ ₺39,99)）

Application Description

甜蛙，下一秒，约见面。 约吃饭、看电影、演唱会、密室逃脱... 在这里，才华不会被埋没，用炸裂的演技展示真实自我，获取Ta的好感，夺回属于你的舞台焦点。 发起邀约 神啊，赐予我一个骑白马的吧 对方应约 稀饭，你是我的菜 联系对方 幽默是一种艺术 线下见面 随时随地的撒狗粮 拍摄短视频 一段即兴的rap展示，让世界认识你 网友疯狂打Call： 「 好瘦的八戒」what？还能直接约，爱了爱了 「 茉莉蜜茶」完了，我中毒了，一天要打开APP几百次 「 巅峰小学生」还能免费约，做慈善吗？ 「 陌人」抓到帅气学长一枚，收工～ 如果您有任何问题，请及时在APP中砸向我们，我们喜欢被砸，您还可以通过邮件吐槽。 吐槽邮箱：tw@yohoing.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: 彩云天气Pro
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • SVIP auto-renew annually：₺299,99 → ₺29,99 (₺29,99 ~ ₺299,99)

Application Description

Differences from the free version: - exclusive rain notification - no Ads Expect the Unexpected with this Beautiful and Easy-to-use Weather App Accurate Minute to Minute Rainfall Forecast - When will the rain start and when is it going to stop? Know about the weather in advance and plan your day out properly! Street-level accuracy: No more imprecise forecasts based on a national or city level! Your exclusive weather forecast for every block in the neighborhood is here! Multiple Location Selections: Street-level accurate forecasts to keep an eye on your loved ones! China Rainfall Map - We use the National Meteorological Radar to produce our accurate forecast. Just take a glimpse to know exactly where and how heavy the rain will be! China Air Pollution Map - Is the pollution growing stronger or fading away? Where is it heading to? Just take a look at this map and get the answer to all of your questions! Real-time satellite imagery From the astronaut's point of view, tracing the flowing cloud and glittering days, and Help yourself judge the weather Omni-directional weather map Look at the evolution trend of precipitation, temperature, dew point temperature, humidity and visibility in the next two days. Weather Feedback - If you feel that our forecast is not completely accurate, please tap the feedback button to help us improve! ------ A big thank you to the "Swarma Club" and our partners for their long-term and unfailing support! Automatic renewal service: 1. Service name：svip auto-renew monthly, svip auto-renew annually. 2. Price：9 RMB / Month, 90 RMB / Year. 3. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. 4. You can manually open the Apple mobile phone 'Settings' - > enter 'iTunes Store and App Store - > click 'Apple ID', select 'view Apple ID', enter the 'account settings' page, click 'subscription', select 'ColorfulClouds Pro continuous subscription', and cancel subscriptions to end it. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. 5. Term of use: https://caiyunapp.com/h5/agreement/vipprotocal.html?ostype=ios_pro&lang=en_US 6. Privacy policy: https://caiyunapp.com/h5/agreement/privacy.html?ostype=ios_pro&lang=en_US

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
